p: Human embryonic kidney 293T (HEK293T; ATCC CRL-11268) and Madin-Darby canine kidney (MDCK; ATCC CCL-34) cells were maintained in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM; Mediatech, Inc.) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), and 1% PSG (penicillin, 100 units/mL; streptomycin 100 μg/mL; l-glutamine, 2 mM) at 37 °C with 5% CO 2 as described [ 12].
